name: Discover Mary Celestia
description:
Off the coast of Bermuda, amidst a graveyard of shipwrecks, sits the wreck of a Confederate blockade runner, the Mary Celestia. You’ve been tasked by the Historic Wrecks Authority (HWA) to delve into the wreck of the Mary Celestia and catalog the artifacts hidden within...

Project created as a part of PoNG Center 2021 Summer Internship in partnership with UC San Diego’s Cultural Heritage Engineering Initiative (CHEI). 

Programmer : Ashwin Swamy
Proj. Manager : Garrett Tan
Artist : Logan Wright
Tester : Naseem Baramki-Azar
Designer : Lawson Pritchard
Coach : Corly Huang
